means.word_mean: 1. any of several plants of the genus Polygonatum having paired drooping yellowish-green flowers and a thick rootstock with scars shaped like Solomon's seal

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Solomon's depiction of parent-child relationships is also awry.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Solomon's depiction of parent-child relationships is also awry.

auth_sentence.content: That's even without Solomon sowing his seed so widely.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's even without Solomon sowing his seed so widely.

auth_sentence.content: In years to come, Sophie Solomon's prodigious resources will be legend.
